definition.summary: A congenital, incurable condition where excessive specific energy (usually Yin) blocks the meridians.
definition.core_mechanism: Blood vessels and meridians malfunction due to an overflow of Yin (Cold) energy.

symptoms: Dysfunctional blood flow and energy circulation.
hidden_trait: Genius Potential: Patients often possess extraordinary intelligence or latent martial talent.
High Risk, High Return: If cured, the blocked energy often converts into massive internal power.

treatment_methods.principle: Neutralization of Yin with strong Yang energy.
items: Neidan (Internal Core) of Yang spiritual creatures (e.g., Fire Carp / 태양화리).
treatment_methods.interaction: Transfer of Yang energy from a master (Protagonist) or Dual Cultivation.

narrative_role: Reason for a character's sudden power-up or genius intellect.

variations.name: 구음절맥 (Gu-eum Jeolmaek / Nine Yin Severed Meridian)
variations.description: Body filled with irresistible Yin energy.
variations.cure_condition: Requires massive Yang energy (e.g., 10,000-year Fire Carp) or a supreme master's aid.

variations.name: 태음신맥 (Tae-eum Sinmaek / Great Yin Divine Meridian)
variations.description: Yin energy increases over time until meridians snap.
variations.special_cure_case: Reference 'Gunlimcheonha': Can be cured/utilized via sexual union with a male practicing Yin Arts (Energy transfer/harmony).

variations.name: 천음절맥 (Cheon-eum Jeolmaek / Heavenly Yin Severed Meridian)
variations.description: A variation of Gu-eum, implying 'Heaven's Will' (Fate). Considered harder to cure.
variations.nuance: Emphasizes the inevitability of the condition.
